chat.title: COVID-19, Paxlovid
chat.message:
Paxlovid dosing for patients with eGFR>30 to <60ml/min:
150 mg nirmatrelvir taken with ritonavir 100 mg Q12H for 5 days.


Paxlovid is not recommended for patients with severe renal impairment (eGFR <30 ml/min).

chat.title: Dosing Duplication
chat.message: For dosing eGFR 60 mL/min or greater the Paxlovid 150 mg/100 mg po BID x 5 days line should be removed.

First entry has  nirmatrelvir-ritonavir 150 mg-100 mg (300 mg-100 mg Dose) oral tablet but is this supposed to be 300 mg -100 mg for the first part before the brackets as well?
Agree there’s a duplicate entry right below that.

There should be a note that there are multiple DDI with Paxlovid and alert the prescriber to discuss with pharmacy or use the following tool https://www.covid19-druginteractions.org/checker
